title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-1.7 - Partial invalidity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 300-1.7 - Partial invalidity

State Regulations

If any part, section, subdivision, paragraph or
provision of this Chapter shall be determined to be invalid, such determination
shall apply only to that particular part, section, subdivision, paragraph or
provision, and all other provisions of this Chapter shall remain valid and in
effect, without limitation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
300-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
